title: Fast hydrolysis for chemical recycling of polyethylene terephthalate (PET)
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,1508-1514
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00034J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Patrícia Pereira, Willem Slear, Angelo Testa, Kevin Reasons, Peter Guirguis, Phillip E. Savage, Christian W. Pester
PET non-catalyzed, non-isothermal hydrolysis can produce 94% terephthalic acid (TPA) yield in 75 seconds.
